channel.title: Think about it
channel.description: When people first started moparscape forums and everyone had 10 rep, how the hell did people get more rep if you need 15 rep to actually rep? lol

Give me rep or I’ll kill your children…

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

When I joined, everyone had 10 rep, everyone gave 1 rep, and anyone could GIVE rep. Those were good times, rep was given for good reasons

Then people abused it, people who didnt deserve it got 50-10 rep, became community members, and ruined the forums. Then this new rep system came to be. Everyone had 10 rep, needed 15 rep to rep someone.

Community members, Moderators, and admins all hda 50 rep, so they gave 3 rep each time they repped someone, resulting in some people getting 15, they gave rep out, and eventually it will be abused again. Currently not many people (Asides from staff/CM’s) had 15 rep, so if we’re responsible it will remain this way.

In the end, rep means NOTHING. Its a shit number made for shit purposes.

Also, back in the old rep system I had 24 rep :(. I felt so cool…

Read full topic

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

it wasn’t always this way. it used to be you started at 0 and anyone could rep anyone. then that was abused and anyone who hadgotten 50 rep legitimetly became a cm and everyone else got bumped to 10. mods and admins and cms were at first the only people who could rep you. slowly poeple got rep andnow lots of poeple can rep on one or both of the forums.
